data.text: @NRPublicHealth Will they discuss  the pfizer 9 pages Side effect. Or the clinical trials were 1220 died?

@Myhairhasamindo @NRPublicHealth So the masks don’t make things worse but they are so ineffective they can’t overcome a one year age difference?

If you’re defending masks on children, you’re failing, badly.

@shaunsomers @NRPublicHealth Read the abstract, the conclusions presented in the study indicate that age is the main factor in covid infection, with masks not being afecting this in a significant way.
The 6 year old presented more infections because they were 6 year olds, not because of the masks.

@NRPublicHealth Is it true that masks are not only useless for covid, but actually can *increase* the risk of infection?
